hymn.title: My inner parts have yearned for Him

layout.singingstanza: My in -- ner parts have yearned for Him; To my Be -- loved I now o -- pen; My Be -- lov -- ed's gone, He has with -- drawn, I o -- pen but He was gone. I am sick with love, I am sick with love for Him. If you find Him, please tell Him that I am sick with love for Him.

lyrics.stanza: I am sick with love, I am sick with love for Him. If you find Him, please tell Him that I am sick with love for Him.
I sought Him but I found Him not. I called Him yet He answered not. If you find my love please tell Him that I'm sick with love for Him.
